verbose_text: Binding of a TGF-beta ligand induces a type II TGF-beta receptor (TGFBR2) dimer to recruit a type I TGF-beta receptor (TGFBR1) dimer resulting in a heterotetrameric receptor complex, which leads to phosphorylation of a receptor-regulated-(R) SMAD protein, formation of an (R-) SMAD complex with a common mediator (Co-) SMAD and transport of the complex to the nucleus where transcription is modulated.
